channel.title: CVE Feed for Changing Information Technology Inc. -- RAVA certificate validation system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Changing Information Technology Inc. -- RAVA certificate validation system

item.title: CVE-2022-39058|2024-09-17T02:27:38.031Z -- changing%20information%20technology%20inc. -- rava%20certificate%20validation%20system
item.description: RAVA certification validation system has a path traversal vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and access arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2022-39056|2024-09-17T04:24:09.603Z -- changing%20information%20technology%20inc. -- rava%20certificate%20validation%20system
item.description: RAVA certificate validation system has insufficient validation for user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject arbitrary SQL command to access, modify and delete database.
